name: 翻譯測驗與評量
description:
The aim of this course is to heighten your awareness of the theories, techniques and procedures in translation quality assessment. It is designed to achieve the following goals:
1.	To familiarize you with theoretical principles of translation assessment that may guide you to be more systematic about your use of evaluation procedures in the classroom. 
2.	To acquaint you with various approaches to translation assessment with the purpose of enabling you to analyze and critique existing tests and research studies.
